channel.title: Hosting a 562 Client
channel.description: Hello, I was just about to host my 562 client, I had made my hosts and downloaded the no-ip duc, changed the client ip to my host ip, ran the server, then the client and it gets stuck (means its offline). Please someone help me. Do I have to portforward to make it work?

item.title: Hosting a 562 Client
item.dc:creator: @smokerboy239 smokerboy239
item.description:
@smokerboy239 wrote:

Hello, I was just about to host my 562 client, I had made my hosts and downloaded the no-ip duc, changed the client ip to my host ip, ran the server, then the client and it gets stuck (means its offline). Please someone help me. Do I have to portforward to make it work?
